Aroma Treasures Tea Tree Shampoo (100 ml) Price: Rs.166

Those days when you just do not want to get out of bed because a great deal of work has piled up during your vacation away from that grinding desk are always the toughest. These trying days always bring out the best of your willpower and you emerge a whole new person who can put much needed sleep behind for those long meetings. Give yourself a soothing hair massage as you shower with this Aroma Treasures Tea Tree Shampoo and the sweet aroma will draw all your hidden energy out
column15:
keeping you alert and active all day long. Get a fresh and gorgeous look by washing your hair with this cleansing shampoo that gives your mane a quick fix whenever you need it.

\r\n

\r\n\tIt\u2019s important for the health of each strand of hair that your scalp be kept clean and free from germs or allergens and this shampoo ensures that it purifies the skin so your hair is fed only rich nutrition. Composed of pure essential oils
column16:
this shampoo will add shine and a healthy glow to your hair so you can flaunt locks that catch the envy in every spectator\u2019s eye. The essential oils ensure to keep moisture locked in your precious hair so you always enjoy well nourished and soft hair that falls like silk. Aloe vera is also a part of this shampoo\u2019s rich base and this makes sure that your hair is supplied all the nourishment it needs to stay healthy and strong.

\r\n

\r\n\tPatchouli
column18: helps to condition your hair and regular use will keep it feeling softer; it also helps in repairing damaged hair that is thin and brittle. Ideal for men and women
column19: this hair oil can nourish your scalp and keep away dandruff every single day. Made with no synthetic perfumes and skin friendly ingredients
column20:
this oil is what your hair is missing.
